alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 9:01PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL NUECES AND SOUTH CENTRAL SAN PATRICIO COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 901 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Odem, or near Taft, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Sinton, Taft, Corpus Christi International Airport, Odem, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Corpus Christi North Beach, and Taft Southwest. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 7. US Highway 181 between mile markers 622 and 630, and between mile markers 640 and 648. US Highway 77 between mile markers 648 and 654. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
